A

addPatron(Patron) - Method in class library.Library
Adds a patron to the end of the patrons ArrayList.

C

checkIn() - Method in class library.Publication
Sets the loanedTo and dueDate fields of the publication to null
checkIn(int) - Method in class library.Library
Calls the checkIn method of the chosen publication
checkOut(int, int) - Method in class library.Library
Calls the chosen publication's checkOut method with a Patron parameter passed in.
checkOut(Patron) - Method in class library.Publication
Sets the publication's loanedTo field to the patron that was passed in and sets the due date 14 days after the current date.

I

InvalidRuntimeException - Exception in library
Custom exception for runtime below 0 seconds.
InvalidRuntimeException() - Constructor for exception library.InvalidRuntimeException
Constructs an InvalidRuntimeExpression with no detailed message.
InvalidRuntimeException(String) - Constructor for exception library.InvalidRuntimeException
Constructs an InvalidRuntimeExpression with a message
InvalidRuntimeException(String, int) - Constructor for exception library.InvalidRuntimeException
Constructs an InvalidRuntimeExpression with a video title and runtime
